question: What is "George Mikan" famous for?
explanation: "George Mikan" is an American basketball player. George Lawrence Mikan Jr., nicknamed "Mr Basketball", was an American professional basketball player for the Chicago American Gears of the National Basketball League (NBL) and the Minneapolis Lakers of the NBL, the Basketball Association of America (BAA) and the National Basketball Association (NBA). Mikan is seen as one of the greatest basketball players of all time.
